name: Truth Behind The Light
description:
My sister? Do not ask.  I am to never speak of that sinner again.  Where she is does not matter. She broke The Light's orders and got what she deserved. I… I did nothing wrong. 

Truth Behind The Light is an eerie visual novel exploring the dark reality of cults. The game was created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022. 

WARNING: TACKLES THEMES OF VIOLENCE, DEATH AND CULTS

Features: 
  • 3 Endings
  • Point and click gameplay
  • Unique style, original story and music
  • 5-15 minutes per playthrough
Credits:

Developed by Henne
Written and drawn by Nia Denkova
Voice-over by Ivy Dupler
Music and sound by Harvey Carman
